author: Staff Reporter
text:
Solatium was disbursed on Tuesday to the legal heirs of two persons who were killed in elephant attacks. Six dependents of Chenniveerappa alias Hanumandhappa of Jawalagiri were given Rs.45,000 each. Chenniveerappa was killed in Jawalagiri forest range in August last. Similarly, dependents of Rajammal were given Rs.3 lakh as solatium. Rajammal was killed in an elephant attack in July last.

Granite-laden lorry seized

A lorry carrying granites worth Rs.3 lakh was seized by special branch sleuths at Mathur in Krishnagiri on Tuesday. According to sources, the lorry driver and the cleaner took off on sighting the police, abandoning the lorry. Investigation is on to trace the owner of the lorry.
title: Solatium disbursed
